GSD.product_version: versions from v4.6 to before v4.19.256
GSD.description:
ASoC: mediatek: mt8173-rt5650: Fix refcount leak in mt8173_rt5650_dev_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.256 by commit e024a24fb264523149658c10c76bb363b3d0004d, it was introduced in version v4.6 by commit 0f83f9296d5c91d08cf46cf1ba8a17fb870dedf0. For more details please see the references link.
